Verses: 1 baabilonukkuk Kondupogumpadi Erusalemilum Yoodhaavilum Siraigalaaip Pidiththuvaikkappatta Janangalukkul Vilangidappattirundha Eremiyaavaik Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Vidudhalaiyaakki Raamaavilirundhu Anuppivittapinbu, Eremiyaavukkuk Karththaraal Undaana Vasanam:
2 kaavarchenaadhipadhi Eremiyaavai Azhaippiththu, Avanai Nokki: Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Indha Sthalaththukku Indhath Theengu Varumendru Solliyirundhaar.

3 thaam Sonnapadiye Karththar Varappanniyumirukkiraar; Neengal Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhu, Avarudaiya Saththaththukku Sevikodaamarponeergal; Aagaiyaal Ungalukku Indhak Kaariyam Vandhadhu.

4 ippodhum Idho, Un Kaigalilidappatta Vilangugalai Indru Neekkippotten; Ennodekooda Baabilonukku Vara Unakku Nanmaiyaaith Thondrinaal Vaa, Naan Unnaip Paththiramaaip Paarththukkolven; Ennodekooda Baabilonukku Vara Unakku Nandraaith Thondraavittaal, Irukkattum; Idho, Dhesamellaam Unakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu, Evvidaththukkuppoga Unakku Nanmaiyum Sevvaiyumaaik Kaangiradho Avvidaththukkup Po Endraan.

5 avan Innum Pogaamalirukkumpodhu, Avan Ivanai Nokki: Nee Baabilon Raajaa Yoodhaa Pattanangalinmel Adhikaariyaaga Vaiththa Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Agikkaamin Maganaana Kedhaliyaavinidaththukkuth Thirumbippoi, Avanode Janangalukkulle Thangiyiru; Illaavittaal, Evvidaththukkup Poga Unakku Sevvaiyaaith Thondrugiradho, Avvidaththukkup Po Endru Solli, Kaavarchenaadhipadhi Avanukku Vazhichchelavaiyum Vegumadhiyaiyum Koduththu Avanai Anuppivittaan.
6 appadiye Eremiyaa Mispaavukku Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Poi, Dhesaththil Meedhiyaana Janangalukkul Avanode Thangiyirundhaan.

7 baabilon Raajaa Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavai Dhesaththinmel Adhikaariyaakkinaan Endrum, Baabilonukku Siraigalaagak Kondupogappattiraadha Kudigalil Ezhaigalaana Purusharaiyum Sthreegalaiyum Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Avanudaiya Visaarippukku Oppuviththaan Endrum, Veliyilirukkira Raanuva Servaikkaarar Anaivarum Avargaludaiya Manusharum Kettapodhu,

8 avargal Mispaavukkuk Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Vandhaargal; Yaarenil, Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelum, Kareyaavin Kumaararaagiya Yoganaanum, Yonaththaanum, Thankoomeththin Kumaaranaagiya Seraayaavum, Neththobaaththiyanaagiya Eppaayin Kumaararum, Maagaaththiyanaana Oruvanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesaniyaavum Aagiya Ivargalum Ivargalai Serndhavargalume.

9 appozhudhu Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Agikkaamin Magan Kedhaliyaa Avargalaiyum Avargal Manusharaiyum Nokki: Neengal Kaldheyarai Sevikka Bayappadavendaam, Neengal Dhesaththilirundhu Baabilon Raajaavai Seviyungal; Appozhudhu Ungalukku Nanmaiyundaagum.

10 naanovenil, Idho, Nammidaththile Varugira Kaldheyaridaththil Sevikkumpadi Mispaavile Kudiyirukkiren; Neengalo Poi, Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Pazhangalaiyum Enneyaiyum Serththu, Ungal Paandangalil Vaiththu, Ungal Vasamaayirukkira Oorgalil Kudiyirungal Endru Aanaiyittu Sonnaan.

11 movaabilum Ammon Puththiraridaththilum Edhomilum Sagala Dhesangalilum Irukkira Yoodharum, Baabilon Raajaa Yoodhaavil Silar Meedhiyaayirukkak Kattalaiyittaanendrum, Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Agikkaamin Maganaana Kedhaliyaavai Avargalmel Adhikaariyaakkinaanendrum, Kettapodhu,

12 ellaa Yoodharum Thaangal Thuraththunda Ellaa Idangalilumirundhu, Yoodhaa Dhesaththil Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Mispaavukku Vandhu, Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Pazhangalaiyum Migudhiyaai Serththuvaiththaargal
13 appozhudhu Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanum Veliyile Irundha Sagala Raanuva Servaikkaararum Mispaavukkuk Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Vandhu,

14 ummaik Kondrupodumpadikku, Ammon Puththirarin Raajaavaagiya Paalis Enbavan, Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelai Anuppinaanenbadhai Neer Ariyavillaiyo Endraargal; Aanaalum Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaa Avargal Vaarththaiyai Nambavillai.

15 pinnum Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaan Mispaavile Kedhaliyaavode Ragasiyamaaip Pesi: Naan Poi Oruvarum Ariyaamal Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelai Vettippoda Uththaravaagavendum; Ummidaththil Serndha Yoodharellaarum Sidharundupogavum Yoodhaavil Meendhavargal Azhiyavum Avan Ummaik Kondrupodavendiyadhenna Endraan.
16 aanaalum Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaa Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanai Nokki: Nee Indhak Kaariyaththai Seyyaadhe; Ismavelinmel Nee Poi Sollugiraai Endraan.
